sourcesContent:
export const translations = {
  en: {
    // Nav

    thFamilyName: "Family Name",

    thRole: "Role",

    roleSon: "Son",
    roleDaughter: "Daughter",
    roleGrandparent: "Grandparent",
    roleOther: "Other",

    // Family List & Edit
